actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider makes two Claw or Longbow attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d4 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Skirmisher
bonus_actions.desc: The tosculi takes the Dash or Disengage action.

special_abilities.name: Archer
special_abilities.desc: A ranged weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the tosculi hits with it (included in the attack).

special_abilities.name: Hive Sense
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi can pinpoint the location of its hive queen when she is within 300 feet of it, and it can sense the general direction and distance to the hive where its queen makes her home.

special_abilities.name: Point Blank Hunter
special_abilities.desc: When the tosculi makes a ranged attack with a bow, it doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature, though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.
